TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CursorInteropHelper extends System.Object
public ref class CursorInteropHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides a static helper class for WPF/Win32 interoperation with one method, which is used to obtain a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) object based on a provided Win32 cursor handle.

span.span: Provides a static helper class for WPF/Win32 interoperation with one method, which is used to obtain a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) object based on a provided Win32 cursor handle.

param.span: Cursor reference to use for interoperation.

summary.span: Returns a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] object based on a provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定自訂游標影像需要安全性權限，即使在完成純[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]程式設計。Setting a custom cursor image requires security permissions even if done in pure [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programming. 請參閱 。See .
